name: Tri-Tourney
description:
Tri-Tourney is a 2D Fighting Game where players use three different fighting styles to defeat each other.  Right now, the game is in a prototype phase, as we are working out some aspects of the combat. 

Before you start playing, make sure that you:

1. Have two Xbox One Controllers for each player

2. Are playing on PC (The game doesn't work on Mac right now)

3. Are playing in Full Screen (It looks better that way)

Finally, here are the people who worked on the Game:

Rick Velez - Lead Designer/Programmer

Gustave Gibbs - Assistant Programmer

Alessandra Reyes - Environmental Artist

Sean Shiplo - Character Artist
